trans-unit.source: Represents additional metadata that is included in a request message to [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/add/includes/ssastoria-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 表示附加到请求消息中包含的元数据[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/add/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceRequestArgs"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the Accept header of the request message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置请求消息的 Accept 标头。

trans-unit.source: No validation is performed on the value of the AcceptContentType property.
trans-unit.target: AcceptContentType 属性的值上不执行任何验证。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, make sure that the supplied value is a valid value for an HTTP Accept header.
trans-unit.target: 因此，请确保提供的值是有效的 HTTP Accept 标头值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Accept header.
Gets or sets the Content-Type header of the request message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置请求消息的内容类型标头。

trans-unit.source: No validation is performed on the value of the ContentType property.
trans-unit.target: 在 ContentType 属性的值不执行任何验证。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, make sure that the supplied value is a valid value for an HTTP Content-Type header.
trans-unit.target: 因此，请确保提供的值是有效的 HTTP Content-type 标头值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Content-Type header.
Gets the headers in the request message.
trans-unit.target: 请求消息中获取的标头。

trans-unit.source: The response is a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> object that contains key-value pairs of strings for each header in the request.
trans-unit.target: 响应是<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602>对象，其中包含的字符串的每个标头在请求中的键 / 值对。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602>

trans-unit.source: No validation is performed on the headers in the Headers property.
trans-unit.target: 中的标头属性的标头不执行任何验证。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, make sure that you do not change an HTTP header in a way that changes the meaning of the request.
trans-unit.target: 因此，请确保你未更改的 HTTP 标头中更改请求含义的方式。

trans-unit.source: The headers in the request message.
Gets or sets the value of the Slug header of the request message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置请求消息的 Slug 标头的值。

trans-unit.source: No validation is performed on the value of the Slug property.
trans-unit.target: Slug 属性的值上不执行任何验证。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, make sure that the supplied value is a valid value for an HTTP Slug header.
trans-unit.target: 因此，请确保提供的值是有效的 HTTP Slug 标头值。

trans-unit.source: A value that is the Slug header of the request.
trans-unit.target: 请求的 Slug 标头值。
